ModMetaData.name: RimFantasy - Gemstones
ModMetaData.author: Sierra
ModMetaData.description:
[h1]Supported Versions:[/h1] [b]Rimworld 1.2[/b]
This mod adds 11 new gemstones, as well as the worktables (requires research) needed to craft the uncut gems into cut gems.
Raw gemstones can be used to craft stuffable furniture and blunt weapons the same way jade works in vanilla. The cut gemstones worth more than their uncut variants and are used in trading and creation of certain ceremonial objects.
[b]Recommended Mods:[/b] [list] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1234567890]RimFantasy - Temperature Pylons[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2244594116]RimTraits - Vanilla Trait Colours[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1916352291]RimTraits - Medieval Talent[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2206957172]RimTraits - General Traits[/url] [/list]
[b]Mod Compatibility:[/b] [list] [*]No Specific Issues Known. [*]Probably won't play well with other gem mods without a patch. [/list]
[b]Balance:[/b] Balance? What balance? This is a mod about rocks!
